interface.name: ItemSelectable
interface.javadoc:
The interface for objects which contain a set of items for which zero or more can be selected.
Amy Fowler
Returns the selected items or null if no items are selected.

Adds a listener to receive item events when the state of an item is changed by the user. Item events are not sent when an item's state is set programmatically. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed. l the listener to receive events ItemEvent
Removes an item listener. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed. l the listener being removed ItemEvent
